subtitle: Celebrate the fruits of summer with this lovely berry dessert.

method.text: In a large bowl, combine the berries. Stir in the sugar and brandy. Stir until well mixed. Cover and leave-to macerate overnight.

Transfer the fruit mixture to a large saucepan. Stir in the wine or orange juice, cinnamon, orange rind and nutmeg. Cook over a low heat for 2-3 min or until sugar has just dissolved. Remove from heat and leave to cool.
Spoon into serving dishes. Top with a spoonful of fromage frais and a pinch of nutmeg.

title: Summer fruits compote
